GK16bhakaviu:296: etad grāhyaṃ surabhi kusumaṃ grāmyam etannidheyaṃ Bh_1.59a
GK16bhakaviu:328: kaṣṭaṃ kiṃ nu kathaṃ nu tat Bh_4.46d
GK16bhakaviu:356: kimayaṃ śaśī na sa divā virājate Bh_3.44a
GK16bhakaviu:375: kiṃ sādhyaṃ kiṃ ca sādhanam Bh_5.56d
GK16bhakaviu:388: kṛtvā kleśāntaṃ yāti vartma praśāntam Bh_2.12b
GK16bhakaviu:398: ke śabdāḥ kiṃ ca tadvācyam Bh_6.20c
GK16bhakaviu:753: na sa nyāyo na sā kalā Bh_5.4b
GK16bhakaviu:756: na sa śabdo na tadvācyaṃ Bh_5.4a
GK16bhakaviu:929: prema ghnanti na hi striyaḥ Bh_4.10d
GK16bhakaviu:1021: mālākāro racayati yathā sādhu vijñāya mālāṃ Bh_1.59c
GK16bhakaviu:1358: śraddheyaṃ jagati mataṃ hi pāṇinīyaṃ Bh_6.63c
GK16bhakaviu:1460: sa hanti dhyāti vā yathā Bh_6.26d
